message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget constraints. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $130. I would like to propose $120 as a compromise. I believe this is a fair offer that respects both our positions.
